venue.address_1: (downstairs at MASH Vet); 72 West Main Street
venue.name: HEX Dog Training & Behavior Modification

item.description:
Game Nights (with HEX Dog Training: http://www.hexdogs.com) will take place every Wednesday for the month of May at 6:00p, and will be centered around...

Fun 'n GAMES to train your dog & work on training SKILLS!

Have you ever played Find It!, Hide 'n Seek, Red Rover or Tic-Tac-Toe with your pooch to practice skills? Would you like to learn how and have some light-hearted fun without realizing you're actually doing serious training?

Then this is the thing for you :)

[No reactive dogs. If this is an issue for you, please contact hexdogs@gmail.com and we'll hook you up.]

Equipment needed for class:
- Quantity of super heavy-duty artillery; (translation: REALLY special crazy-delicious dog treats like real meat, cheese, or smelly, soft dog treats)
- 4 foot leash (NO Flexi leashes)
- A can-do attitude! :)
- Collar choice may depend on dog.

Dogs must be healthy, vaccinated, and free from contagious afflictions.

$15 per dog per Game Night, or $50 for 4 (Game Nights will continue in June!). No pre-registration necessary, although discount package may be purchased on http://www.hexdogs.com/register--pay-for-classes.html.
item.name: Game Nights!! (for the month of May with HEX Dog Training)
